casebody.data:
No. D-2883. Supreme Court of the United States March 21, 2016.

In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Leroy Russell CASTLE.

Leroy Russell Castle, of Durham, North Carolina, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
